website_summaries.verdict: Gets top marks for its quality solid wood construction. Handcrafted in Texas and thoughtfully designed with the needs of bats in mind.
pros: Users like the size, which is large enough to house 25 bats but not conspicuously huge
cons: Not the cheapest option on the market

customer_reviews.title: Very well made...
customer_reviews.text: Nice... We have a little pond on our property which always has plenty of mosquitoes around it. The thinking is getting one or two these will help me organically control the mosquito population. The Bat House is well built and plenty large enough to house many bats. The groves cut in the back are also cut in the back of the front so the bats not only hang around on the front of the back but also the back of the front (hopefully that makes sense, funny).. Being made of cedar I would think it will last for a long time in the elements. I'd definitely buy again. Now, I hope some bats move in...
customer_reviews.author: Charlie J

customer_reviews.title: We received the bat house as promised. It was ...
customer_reviews.text: We received the bat house as promised. It was a gift for Christmas. Well made and I would order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Vandermeulen

customer_reviews.title: Nice bat house! Easy to mount than some others I have used.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy! I love that they had two nice places to screw it in from the front. Being high on a ladder and trying to hang these on some of the notches on the back other bat houses use can be rough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! USA made!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good bat box have to wait until spring to put it up may have to buy a couple more. The best thing about this is that it’s made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: House is well made and easy to install with the predrilled holes and the included ...
customer_reviews.text: House is well made and easy to install with the predrilled holes and the included LONG screws! I like that it has grooves inside to help the bats hang more easily and has the vent for better air circulation. So far, no bats have moved in, but a nice house awaits!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Made very well. I recommend purchasing the bat spray that attracts bats to let them be aware of the house.
customer_reviews.author: cjgbrown

customer_reviews.title: Nice bat house
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. This seems to be very well made. I wanted a made in USA one. It was a gift and she loved it. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality Bat House!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product. Glad to be able to help the bat population and reduce the flying insect pests at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: John F. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Happy for the Bats in my Belfry
customer_reviews.text: I am really excited about this purchase and for an opportunity to host some bats in my garden area. They often roost under the eves and I am hoping they find this little roost inviting. Bees and bats - WE NEED THEM :)
customer_reviews.author: G.I. Jane

customer_reviews.title: Just put up this weekend
customer_reviews.text: Painted it dark brown for winter. Just had our "tree guy" put up three of them. Hope the bats find them and are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Annie in Indie

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality control. One piece was loose and I had to glue it. The inner side of the upper most piece doesn’t have the grooves cut in it(for the bats to grab on to). Not made well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Very well crafted, easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: Well crafted, arrived quickly. No bats yet, but maybe I just posted it too late in the year for any to want to move in.
customer_reviews.author: Luna92

customer_reviews.title: bat house arrived in perfect condition. I just had it installed below the ...
customer_reviews.text: bat house arrived in perfect condition. I just had it installed below the overhang on my barn last week. I will check for activity at a later ate.
customer_reviews.author: just BOB

customer_reviews.title: Up and waiting
customer_reviews.text: Just got it hung. Seems well made. Just waiting on bars to find it.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Bippee

customer_reviews.title: Well made...
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Hopefully when we hang it it will be full of our little bat friends!
customer_reviews.author: mamablaze7

customer_reviews.title: Bats that eat mosquitoes find a new home....
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made and matches the description very well - real wood and expert for housing bats and their families...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Calling all bats
customer_reviews.text: The quality of materials and construction are outstanding - AND it's made in the good ole US of A!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: corneille

customer_reviews.title: Great house for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great house for the price. I had a bat living in my gable vent, after a couple days of putting the house up, I do not see the bat in my gable vent anymore. Just do your research on how/where to mount a bat house.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: quality construction, just waiting for bats to find and occupy
customer_reviews.author: barbara southwell

customer_reviews.title: The Bat house looks great. Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: The Bat house looks great. Well constructed. Placing it on the home in a couple of weeks. Hopefully it will make a nice home for our "batty" friends. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bat house
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount on a tree...just waiting for the bats to come. If they do, I will definitely order another
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: I am batty for Bats because they are really good people. This house should
customer_reviews.text: I am batty for Bats because they are really good people. This house should, and will, allow a safe haven for up to 40 of my batty friends. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Rondell Gunn

customer_reviews.title: It's a good size without being too big
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband as a holiday gift.I chose it because it because it's a bit larger than most of the other choices. It's a good size without being too big. The quality is excellent,it is well built and nice looking. That's important for us as we're placing it on the house in plain view. We live in Texas where the Zika virus is starting to show up.I like that's it's made in the USA.The house arrive quickly and was in perfect condition. So far, I would recommend it. Can't wait for the bats to move in.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Needham

customer_reviews.title: Hoping for bats in our Belfry
customer_reviews.text: We love it, though only time will tell if the bats do! I'll update this review if we get some residents.
customer_reviews.author: MMF in OR

customer_reviews.title: Bringing bats to your own home is as intelligent as housing wasps and snakes to make sure thieves ...
customer_reviews.text: This is sheer madness. Bats to get rid of mosquitoes? How about rabies?! Bringing bats to your own home is as intelligent as housing wasps and snakes to make sure thieves won't be interested in breaking into your house. Who cares how this home is made? This is a bad idea in principle.
customer_reviews.author: azazellie

product_meta.title: Belfry HaBATat Premium Cedar Bat House - Single Chamber Bat Shelter - Made in USA
product_meta.description:
Belfry Premium Bat Houses - Solid Cedar Construction, Made in the U.S.A.

The Belfry HaBATat gives up to 25 bats a perfect place to nest. This high-quality, single chamber bat shelter is perfect for your small colony. You may also choose to use several bat houses outdoor for even more beneficial bat inhabitants.

Bats are highly effective for insect control. One bat can eat thousands of potentially dangerous disease-spreading mosquitos and other pesky critters every night!

A wide variety of highly beneficial bat species will use this cozy bats house. Welcome them into your backyard with the Belfry HaBATat:

Made in Texas, U.S.A.
Durable solid-wood cedar construction
Hand-assembled and packaged
Weatherproof and long lasting
Mounting screws included
Size: 18.25 x 12.75 x 4 inches

The interior and front platform are made of rough, grooved cedar for easy clinging when roosting and landing. Cedar is extremely durable and is weather and decay resistant.

The Belfry HaBATat may be easily flush-mounted in a variety of locations using the included screws and pre-drilled holes. Pole mounting is another good option. (Pole not included).

Mount your shelter 8 feet to 12 feet high in a tree, under the eave of a building or using a pole. Can also be placed near ponds, lakes or streams facing the sun.

When you order today, your satisfaction is completely guaranteed. If you don’t think the Belfry HaBATats are the best bat houses for sale on Amazon, you can return your purchase for a full refund. So the click the Add to Cart button now and get your bat box house delivered right to your door.
feature_bullets: ✅ ALL NATURAL CEDAR BAT BOX - Weather and Decay Resistant for years of use. This large bat house mounts quickly to house, tree or pole with included screws. 18.25" x 12.75" x 4"
✅ SPECIFICALLY DESIGNED TO ATTRACT BATS - Grooved wood design creates an excellent clinging surface to make the perfect habitat for bats
✅ SHELTERS UP TO 25 BATS - Perfect bat habitat for natural mosquito and outdoor pest control
✅ MADE IN USA - These solid-wood bat boxes are handcrafted with care in the Texas hill country. NO particle board. NO plywood.
✅ SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - We KNOW you'll love these bat houses, but if you don't, we'll take it back - no questions asked
